item.title: Icarus
item.description:
“Icarus” is a documentary on Netflix. You should watch it, it’s very good. There’s no need to look up more about it, it’s better to just watch the movie.
Ok, if you want a bit more information, then – without spoilers – here it is. “Icarus” begins as a documentary about an American amateur cyclist, Bryan Fogel, who in 2014 injects himself with testosterone, steroids and other drugs to win a gruelling cycle race in the French Alps.
